titles.title: Restoring Confidence in the World Anti-Doping Agency Act of 2024
Restoring Confidence in the World Anti-Doping Agency Act of 2024

A bill to amend the Office of National Drug Control Policy Reauthorization Act of 2006 to modify the authority of the Office of National Drug Control Policy with respect to the World Anti-Doping Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
